Class.name: VKReader.Requests.APIPublicMethodsCaller
Class.Description: This class is actually API wrapper (with some properties disabled) for VK API.

Method.name: UsersGet
Method.Description:
Returns extended users' information to array 'response' of class VKReader.Data.User, given:
'userIds' - comma separated list of users vk ids or screen names.
'fields' - comma separated list of additional fields required (only possible values for this wrapper : 'sex', 'bdate', 'city', 'country').
'nameCase' - grammatical case for user's first and last name.
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/users.get

Method.name: DatabaseGetCitiesById
Method.Description:
Returns 'response' array with city vk id as key and city name as value, given:
'cityIds' - comma separated list of city vk ids
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/database.getCitiesById

Method.name: UtilsResolveScreenName
Method.Description:
Returns type (user or community) and id of user or community with passed screenname:
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/utils.resolveScreenName
Method.Implementation: set parameters = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() do parameters.SetAt(screenName, "screen_name") set status = ##class(VKReader.Requests.RequestSender).SendHttpRequest(, "method/utils.resolveScreenName", parameters, .responseData) if ($$$ISERR(status)) { quit status } #dim responseObject As %ZEN.proxyObject set status = status * ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(responseData, , .responseObject) if (responseObject.error '= "") { set errorMessage = responseObject.error."error_msg" set errorCode = responseObject.error."error_code" set status = $system.Status.Error(5001, "VK API error: "_errorCode_" "_errorMessage) quit status } set responseObject = responseObject.response set type = responseObject.type set objectId = responseObject."object_id" quit status

Method.name: WallGet
Method.Description:
Returns list of posts represented by class VKReader.Data.Post from specified wall, given:
'ownerId' - wall owner id.
'domain' - wall owner screenname.
'offset' - number of posts to skip at the beginning
'filter' - setting for filtering (possible values are : 'all', 'others', 'owner', 'postponed', 'suggests')
'count' - number of posts to return
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/wall.get

Method.name: WallSearch
Method.Description:
Returns list of posts represented by class VKReader.Data.Post from (un)specified wall searched by query, given:
'query' - phrase to search with
'ownerId' - wall owner id.
'domain' - wall owner screenname.
'offset' - number of posts to skip at the beginning
'ownersOnly' - mark this as true to search only posts authored by wall's owner
'count' - number of posts to return
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/wall.search

Method.name: NewsfeedSearch
Method.Description:
Returns list of posts represented by class VKReader.Data.Post from the whole vk newsfeed searched by query, given:
'query' - phrase to search with
'count' - number of posts to return
'latitude' and 'longitude' - geographical ccordinates of the point to search nearby (numeric values in ranges [-90;90] and [-180;180] accordingly)
'startDate', 'startTime', 'endDate' and 'endTime' - horolog values to specify time range of search. For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/newsfeed.search
